title: Astonishing presence of mind and physical commitment earns England shot at Rugby World Cup glory
text:
There was a popular theory about Eddie Jones that he would wear the England team down after a couple of years with his intensity and sky-high standards. Did the side who outclassed the world champions here look burnt-out to you?

The “gods of rugby,” as Jones called the All Blacks, are the game’s deity no more - and England have a juicy chance of replacing them.

Their finest performance since the World Cup winning year of 2003 - one of their best ever, in fact - was borne of astonishing presence of mind, physical commitment, energy, and a self-assurance they had no real right to display...
description: There was a popular theory about Eddie Jones that he would wear the England team down after a couple of years with his intensity and sky-high standards.
